products.name: French's, classic yellow mustard imp
products.categories: Condiments, Sauces, Mustards, Yellow mustards, Groceries
products.facts: ["French's classic yellow mustard is made from a blend of mustard seeds, vinegar, water, and spices.","The mustard seeds used are sourced from sustainable farming practices to minimize environmental impact.","French's is committed to using high-quality, non-GMO ingredients in their mustard products.","The packaging for French's mustard is recyclable, promoting eco-friendly disposal options."]

products.facts: ["Energy Zero Ultra - 21 is made from 100% recyclable materials.","The product is designed to minimize its carbon footprint during production.","It utilizes eco-friendly packaging to reduce environmental impact.","Quality testing ensures that Energy Zero Ultra - 21 meets high safety and performance standards."]

products.name: Creamy Peanut Butter
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Legumes and their products, Fats, Spreads, Nuts and their products, Plant-based spreads, Vegetable fats, Oilseed purees, Legume butters, Nut butters, Peanut butters
products.facts: ["Made from roasted peanuts and may contain added salt and sugar.","Typically packaged in recyclable glass or plastic containers.","Peanut farming can be more environmentally sustainable than other crops due to its nitrogen-fixing properties.","Quality can vary based on processing methods, with natural options containing no hydrogenated oils or preservatives."]

products.name: Tortilla Strips
products.categories: Snacks, Salty snacks, Appetizers, Chips and fries, Crisps, Corn chips
products.labels: No artificial preservatives, No gluten, No artificial colors, No artificial colours and preservatives, No cholesterol, es:no-vegan
products.facts: ["Tortilla strips are typically made from corn, which is a renewable resource.","Many brands use non-GMO corn to produce their tortilla strips, supporting eco-friendly practices.","Tortilla strips are often fried or baked, with some brands offering healthier, lower-fat options.","Quality tortilla strips are made with minimal ingredients, ensuring a crisp texture and authentic flavor."]

products.name: Organic Vanilla Almond Milk
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Beverages, Plant-based foods, Dairy substitutes, Milk substitutes, Nuts and their products, Plant-based beverages, Plant-based milk alternatives, Nut-based drinks, Almond-based drinks, Vanilla almond-based drinks
products.facts: ["Made from organic almonds and organic vanilla flavoring.","Contains no artificial preservatives or additives, ensuring high quality.","Almonds used are sourced from sustainable farms that promote eco-friendly practices.","The packaging is often recyclable, reducing environmental impact."]

products.name: Pure Water
products.categories: Beverages, Waters, Spring waters, Mineral waters
products.facts: ["Pure water is composed of two hydrogen atoms and one oxygen atom (H2O).","Pure water is essential for maintaining ecological balance and supporting life on Earth.","The quality of pure water is determined by its pH level, absence of contaminants, and mineral content.","Pure water can be produced through processes such as distillation, reverse osmosis, and filtration."]

products.name: Fonds d'artichauts
products.packaging: Boite et couvercle métal à recycler, Pensez au tri!, Point vert, conserve
products.facts: ["Fonds d'artichauts is made primarily from artichokes, ensuring a rich flavor profile.","The product is packaged in a recyclable glass jar, promoting eco-friendliness.","It contains no artificial preservatives, ensuring high quality and natural taste.","Fonds d'artichauts is gluten-free, catering to a wider range of dietary preferences."]
